review: Absolutely love the fire tv sticks!! So much packed into a little package!
author: Daryl Green

review: Excellent little item.. who could believe that one little tiny item like this could put movies from the computer input to the TV Screen.. We are enjoying it greatly..
author: Nancy Wolfe

review: Very easy to use, love it!
author: April

review: a little slow to respond at times, but otherwise great device for Amazon prime users
author: John B. Kendrick "Mac Newbie"

review: Works like a charm, you will need an outlet for the hdmi stick. You can also download an app on a supported device to have a backup remote.
author: anon

review: Once I figured out that using the enclosed adapter made it work better, all was good! I love how quick and responsive this is!
author: Jeannine L. McCarty

review: Love it. Our TV is not new, but was ahead of technology when we purchased it from Circuit City. Remember them. The fire stick gives us wide range of TV beyond only Netflix. Wish we done it sooner.
author: Josephine Gamboa-Montgomery

review: So Fast response, easy GUI and installed in minutes
author: rebeccc

review: Works great but I guess I assumed more shows and movies would be free.also can't get Netflix to work just yet

review: I cut the cable! Yay! I love it!
